In England, in the seven days to 30 June, there were 125,985 new confirmed cases (223.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 June, there were 72,582 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 74% (53,403 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 July is 4,282,762 (7,608.8 cases per 100,000 population).
